summary: This is an email chain from June 2020 between personnel at the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, discussing scheduling a meeting to discuss the Epstein trusts. The email indicates internal coordination about the case.

persons.name: Audrey
persons.context: A person with whom a meeting about the Epstein trusts is to be scheduled, as indicated in the email chain.

connections.description: Scheduled to meet together to discuss the Epstein trusts, indicating a working relationship.
SM suggests rescheduling a meeting contingent on Audrey's availability.

events.title: Scheduled Meeting on Epstein Trusts
events.description: A meeting is scheduled for Thursday (implied July 2, 2020) between M., Audrey, and a contractor to discuss the Epstein trusts.

locations: U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York
keyFacts: As of June 2020, the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York was actively discussing the Epstein trusts.
The meeting about the trusts was to be scheduled discreetly ('no need to email anyone about it just yet').
The document is internal government correspondence, showing ongoing case work after Jeffrey Epstein's death.
